name: Super Math Saga
description: Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. There are 40 levels and 8 unique bosses in this math adventure. Super Math Saga is designed to help players improve their math arithmetic in a fun way. As players progress, the math questions will get more challenging. Math questions are based around addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, multiples, prime numbers, and finding even / odd numbers! Can you beat all the levels and make your way to the final boss? Join the saga and find out!
